attributes.additional_details:
This is a petition to allow Allerphase to be supplied to consumers in the UK.
Allerphase is a safe, herbal alternative to standard antihistamines.  The product has a proven record of success with consumers, many of whom attest that Allerphase completely relieves all symptoms of seasonal allergies (hay fever).  So far there are no side effects associated with Allerphase.  The product used to be available to purchase from UK third-party suppliers but this is no longer possible due to EU Trade Restrictions.
